articles.author: Brian McGleenon
articles.title: Biden's brutal snub to EU as hopes of Western Alliance crushed - Daily Express
articles.description: JOE Biden's reputation with EU leaders is faltering because of his decision to focus on America's Asian allies with one of the bloc's leading officials warning that the move is 'not good for the West'.

articles.title: WarnerMedia opens regional hub in Singapore, Business News & Top Stories - The Straits Times
articles.description: Major media company WarnerMedia has opened a regional hub in Singapore and will be launching its premium HBO Max platform in Asia.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: Morrison in defence mode as AUKUS fallout goes global - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Frozen out in Europe, feted in Washington, alarming some of its south-east Asian neighbours: the AUKUS misfire raises questions about Australia’s ability to perform on the world stage.
